title: Invalid Username on PBE?
body: Hey, all! I wanted to test out some of the assassin reworks so I patched up my PBE account and tried to log in but it said my username/password was invalid. I've tried every password I've ever used. Also, when I try to sign up for PBE again, it says "Get to Testing!" I also cannot log into the PBE website. I'm not sure what the problem is. Help please?

replies.body:
I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to recover this PBE account.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
